text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump They brings the equipment such as toilet paper, food, hand sanitizer to department stores, equipment for the police, hospitals, doctors, nurses & everything to the essential workers during this Coronavirus Epidemic. Hopefully our government will help our Truck Drivers. #Scoun
